sentences.en: a campaign to encourage childless couples to adopt
sentences.cn: 鼓励无子女夫妇领养孩子的运动

sentences.en: A higher'co - efficient of preservation'characterises married women with children than childless marriages.
sentences.cn: 有子女的已婚妇女同无子女的婚姻相比,其“保存生命的系数”较高.

sentences.en: And this devastates Katharine and also forges in her mind a resolve to stay childless.
sentences.cn: 凯瑟琳受到了沉重的打击,并且坚定了她不要孩子的决心.
许多无子女的夫妇收养孩子.

sentences.en: Of course, under the correct circumstances, I refuse to be in a childless family.
sentences.cn: 当然, 如果在条件允许的情况下, 我是不会做丁克家庭的.

sentences.en: The old shroud is given to a newly married, childless couple to cover the connubial bed.
sentences.cn: 旧的裹尸布给新婚燕尔 、 尚未生育的夫妇用来铺婚床.

sentences.en: The typical family may remain childless and consist only of a man and a woman.
sentences.cn: 普通的家庭可能不带孩子,只有一男一女.

sentences.en: The work has been hailed as a breakthrough in treating the childless.
sentences.cn: 这项研究被誉为治疗不孕症的突破.

sentences.en: They prey on the barren and childless woman and to the widow show no kindness.
sentences.cn: 他恶待(或作他吞灭)不怀孕不生养的妇人,不善待寡妇.

sentences.en: They prey on the barren childless woman, and to the widow show no kindness.
sentences.cn: 他恶待〔或作他吞灭〕不怀孕不生养的妇人 、 不善待寡妇.
